Invalid description Incorrect Date Format Wrong date Enter expiration date Day does not exist Month does not exist Wrong year //framgent_manageDiscount Steps to take for the discount Percentage Description Expiration date Add //dialog Yes No Ok Sorry! Location not found. Please try again You have no business! To register one click the button at the bottom right! You have just activated the steps counter, this applies to all your discounts in the Home. To have an accurate detection, place the device in your pocket, do your walks and at the end remember to deactivate it to see your results !! Steps counter Click on the marker in red to confirm the entry of the activity //networkcontroller Connect Cancel Internet connection too weak or absent. //manageDiscount Successful discount entry! Expiration date(dd/mm/yyyy) Enter the date manually, as your device version does not support automatic entry through calendar Respect format: dd/mm/yyyy Enter a number of steps between 2000 and 100000 Invalid date //SellerView No business recorded Discounts No discount available //CardView Here is the discount code that was given to you: "Here is your discount code:" //UserMapView A new discount has been added! Click on the red marks on the map to discover more. //UserView Position detection in progress No discount activated Discount added successfully Easy Medium difficulty Hard Discount deleted By denying the geolocation you will not be able to fully use this app Geolocation permission Active Discounts No discount activated Completed //SellerMapView Existing business, enter another one. //FragmentMapBackdrop Discount list available No discount available expiration : Expired //Statistics Daily steps Daily Kcal Daily meters //Plurals
